member.name: M:LJCRegionDAL.City.#ctor
member.remarks: A default constructor is required for a serializable object.

member.name: M:LJCRegionDAL.City.Clone
member.summary: Clones the structure of the object.
member.returns: A new object with the same structure as the current object.

member.name: M:LJCRegionDAL.City.CompareTo(LJCRegionDAL.City)
member.returns: The integer that indicates the order relationship of the objects.
member.remarks:
A negative integer - This instance precedes the compare-to object.
Zero - This instance and the compare-to object have the same position.
A postive integer - This instance follows the compare-to object.

member.name: T:LJCRegionDAL.Cities
member.summary: Represents a collection of City objects.

remarks.para: Provides Data Access Layer (DAL) classes for the LJCRegionManager program.
The LJCRegionDAL library contains Data and Manager classes for presenting an object oriented view of the Region Manager database data.
The Manager classes use LJC.DataAccess to communicate with the database.
The LJCRegionDAL project is part of the LJCRegionManager solution.

member.name: M:LJCRegionDAL.Cities.Add(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and adds the object from the provided values.
member.returns: A reference to the added item.

member.name: M:LJCRegionDAL.Cities.LJCSearchName(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the collection element with name.
member.returns: A reference to the matching item.
